title: **loot_name_ward_skin_rental_8
body:
I opened this from hextech crafting, it still says the same thing when i hover over it in my ward skin shards
Is this common, ive never seen this before

replies.body:
Hey! 

There is current a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins. Don't worry - you still own them! 

In the meantime, we're looking into what's causing this.

Just got one from a Project Cashe today. (rental_8)
Any update on if the cause has been located and will be fixed for next patch?
Ay! Still in the process of looking into this. No ETA at the moment.
I got this 1 too. But without further thinkin i went and unlocked it. Buuut as you may guess its not in a ward roster, so now i wonder do i really have it or is it lost forever?

Just got the same thing. Found this post by Googling the name and I was wondering if anyone else got the same 
lol
